sentence.Network_en: Objective: to do domesticate cultivation of Asarum heteropodies Fr.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 驯化栽培北细辛、华细辛.

sentence.Network_en: Asarum is an efficacious traditional Chinese medicine.
sentence.Network_cn: 细辛(马兜铃科细辛属)为我国传统中草药,具有祛风散寒,通窍止痛,温肺化饮之功效,自古以来,一直被医家视为祛除痼疾的常用药.

sentence.Network_en: The stretching method shows that composite asarum water decoction with nifedipine can have significant analgesic action.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文用扭体法实验研究表明,细辛水煎剂与硝苯地平配伍对醋酸致痛有协同镇痛作用.
